faqs.title: Can I use only one KPI app or do I need all of them?
faqs.text: Yes, KPI apps work together for the best results. If you want to use only one app, you can choose the one you need. Our sales team can advise which apps are best for your business.

faqs.title: How can I ensure KPI apps work together?
faqs.text: All KPI apps are integrated, so they work more efficiently together. Our team can assist with integration and setup.

faqs.title: Can I test the KPI app?
faqs.text: Yes, you can use the app during a free trial period. This allows you to test all features and see if it suits your business.

faqs.title: How does customer support work?
faqs.text: Through the platform, you can easily communicate with your clients. Our team is always ready to assist with questions, complaints, and advice.

faqs.title: Is there a way to manage orders and sales?
faqs.text: Yes, all orders, sales, and accounts can be tracked on a single platform, helping you manage your business efficiently.
